pr_title: Fix link to SameSite cookies on security guide

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[that] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.
          
          
            
            Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[SameSite cookies] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.
          
      
    
    
  

Good catch btw!
timeline.author: gsmet

+Please see link:vertx#same-site-cookie[that] for information about adding a https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Set-Cookie/SameSite[SameSite] cookie property to any of the cookies set by a Quarkus endpoint.
